resources.string: This app is a demonstration of a using a Messenger to communicate with a service. The MessengerService app must be installed BEFORE this app is installed.
The service is starting, it may take a minute or two...
Tried to connect to service, but failed.
One-way communication, activity to service. The service will display a Toast when it receives the message.

Two-way communication. This Activity will send a Message to a service. The service will reply back to the Activity with a Message. The contents of the Message will be displayed in the Status area below.
The MessengerService app must be installed BEFORE this application. Please uninstall this app, install MessengerService, and then reinstall the MessengerClient app.
Required for remote appications to start the Timestamp Service.
This is the custom permission to prevent unauthorized use of the Timestamps service.
You must grant permission before this app can use the Timestamp Service.
